Perfect size, open knit and just right for a slightly chilly day! Washed it on cold, hung up to dry. Perfect piece!

I ordered this sweater (light blue) so I can have a light wrap for my sub-equator residence where it sometimes gets mildly chilly during the winter months, which are during the North American Summer months. It is the perfect texture, size, warmth level, feel, material, and just overall very cute! I ordered a large because I don't mind the oversized look. It was exactly what I wanted. Highly recommended!
I have several of this style sweater in different colors. This pink one goes great over my sleeveless pink flowered tops.

If you want the slouchy boho look in the photo order 1-3 sizes up. I wear small/med shirt and ordered a large and it’s perfect! I was hesitant that the quality might not be as shown in the photo but IT IS! I’ve worn this almost every day since it was delivered. It’s the perfect boho look and feel. If you’re someone who is cold all the time at restaurants, movie theaters, etc., it’s the perfect cardigan bc it folds up super small but the material is good enough quality (even with the little holes) to keep you pretty warm when the air conditioning is blasting. It would make for a great gift too!

I love the colors and style of this open front cardigan. They run a bit small, so if you want a more fitted look, order your regular size, but if you want a roomier cardigan to layer thicker items of clothing underneath, size up. I sized up because the M fit, but it wasn't as roomy as I like my cardigans to be, so I returned the 4 I ordered in various colors, and sized up to an L. They are pretty sweaters. They simultaneously have the hippy, boho, and gypsy look. My only complaint is that they are made in China. Other than that, I highly recommend this lovely sweater.

I actually bought it in three colors ha!  I did size down to a small.  I usually wear a medium.  I am 5' tall and 124 lb.  The sweaters are still plenty long but not huge.

评论概述: This is knitted, it is not crochet.
评论详情: Whether an honest mistake or deliberately misleading people, this is common error.  Crochet cannot be done on a machine, and real hand crochet is horribly expensive.  This garment is not even a close approximation.  No, I am not a legit purchaser, because  I would never buy fake crochet.
Great color, great lightweight sweater for summer.  Very soft.  Nice to throw over shorts and a T-shirt or could wear with a dressier outfit as well.

This sweater is oversized. I could have gone down a size but liked the look with jeans. Reasonably priced. Quality seems ok but I hand washed it. Not sure it would fair well machine washed. I only order one... I believe the color is nude. The sweater arrived in a vacuum pack. It is lovely! It is durable. The 3rd time I wore it, I snagged it on my ring. I was able to stretch it back put and it was like new again. I am cold natured and although the knitting is loose and lovely, it is amazingly warm. Now I want one in every color because it is comfortable and versatile. By the way, when I took it out of the package there was no smell.
